string.value: #p2111001#'s eyes normally scare me off, but his eyes seem sad today. According to him, #p2111003# was found at #p2111002#'s lab when the lab exploded because of the failed experiment. No one knows when or how it was made... and Humanoid himself doesn't remember his origins. \n\nMaybe #p2111002#'s experiment didn't fail as everyone believes... the one item that #p2111003# is holding on to, despite not remembering anything from the past, says it all. I better go to #b#p2111005##k and give her #p2111002#'s piece of mind.

#p2111005# seemed stunned when receiving the medicine, but then turned into pure joy and happiness. #p2111005# seemed determined to get better with the medicine, so she can really improve her alchemy skills to one day turn #p2111003# into a human being. Hopefully her experiment will end up being successful.

...I knew it. I knew it... yes, this medicine is for #p2111005#. This should be potent enough for #p2111005# to be completely cured from her illness. I can imagine how #p2111002# may have felt the moment he came up with the medicine... poor guy.

After #p2111002#'s failed experiment, the first thing that was discovered in #p2111002#'s lab after that horrific explosion was... actually #p2111003#. No one knows when it was made, or how... it's a mysterious machine doll... the one with no memory of the past.

But there was one item that he never let go of his hand... and that was this medicine. I had no idea what it was for, so I let him hold on to it, and... it was for #p2111005#. For #p2111005#. ...would you like to hand this medicine to #p2111005#?
If #p2111002#'s goal was to live an eternal life, then maybe he succeeded in doing that, even if that meant completely wiping out his memories...
Sigh... I can't bare to see #p2111005# without breaking up. Please do it for me.

Hello traveler! Hey, what is this? It looks like a medicine... what? It's a medicine that #p2111001# asked you to give to #p2111005#? Are you saying this will make me healthier and stronger? Wow... thank you so much!

So if I become healthier, that means I can concentrate more on my studies and experiments, right? This is really making me happy now. I'll study even more now so that one day, #p2111003 will live the life of a human being!
Have you not gone to see #b#p2111005##k yet? Please do it for #p2111005#, and for #p2111002#.
Ah? Hello traveler. Do you need #p2111005# for something?
You found a way to lose #t4031738#. Good thing an alchemist from Alcadno found it and returned it to me. Please be careful with it. It's an important bottle of medicine.
